item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Let’s start this long weekend by biking the Rockingham Trail! . Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.   This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.    I thought that we would bike for about  four hours.   We will be riding the trail all the way to scenic Governor’s Lake in Raymond (this is about 10 miles one way), where we will eat our lunch and cool off by soaking our feet in the lake.   There are so many scenic views along the way.      This trail is NOT paved.   Mountain bikes or Hybrids are a must!

We will meet at 10:00 am at the Candia Rd parking lot in Manchester, NH.   Please follow these directions.   Take route 93 to Route 101 East, take Exit 1 take a right at the bottom, take second right around the traffic circle (Route 28), then enter the parking lot for the lake on your left.

 

Please remember to pack a lunch and bring your sunscreen, insect repellent and lots of fluids.

 

This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location: Candia Rd , Manchester NH
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Biking Manchester to Raymond
